blog.name: aryaarianne
blog.title: they should have killed the masters
blog.description: book-only fics and edits for asoiaf. favs are arya and arianne, then w/o particular order brienne, bran, asha, meera, gendry, sansa, dany, myrcella, rhaena, elia, ned, arthur, edric, rickon, robb, cat, jon, satin, missandei, etc..... ship daenrya, jonrya, gendrya, daensa, sansaery, theonsa, sansan, aryanne, arianerys, ariansa, braime, elaena, elianna, jonygritte, jormund, asherys, ashrianne, edrya, briensa, nedcat, etc. etc. etc..... tbh open to most anything. also love platonic ships, especially sibling friendships! i have a fondness for rare pairs and aus as well, but a weird unflinching obsession with accuracy in fancasts so don't expect any cherubic aryas or pale faced ariannes in my posts

please dont come at me for putting sansa at seven lmao
cause a) idc b) its about fighting the whitewalkers c) idc
summary:
Bran: You just have to play the hand you're dealt. 
Bran: Arya? That girl's an ace.
Bran: Jon is my king up my sleeve...
Bran:...
body:
Bran: You just have to play the hand you're dealt. 
Bran: Arya? That girl's an ace.
Bran: Jon is my king up my sleeve...
Bran: Lady Stoneheart is my old maid...
Bran: Meera is my queen. That's easy, give me a hard one.
Bran: Melisandre is the instruction card you throw away...
Bran: Sansa is a solid seven...
Bran: And yeah, Rickon is still a baby, so he's probably, like, a two? But you know, twos can be wild.
Bran: And I'm obviously the joker.

summary: Let me tell you, waking up to four comments and over 200 hits on Going North blew my mind. I’ve never gotten this big of a...
body:
Let me tell you, waking up to four comments and over 200 hits on Going North blew my mind. I’ve never gotten this big of a response on a story his quickly before and it’s absolutely amazing!!! Thanks you so much to everyone that read the story and left a comment, it put a huge smile on my face. The next chapter will be posted on the 19th of June, so please look forward to it!

Also, if you don’t know what this is about, you can read the story here.

summary: be careful with your fingers  Actually, just put that thing away Greyjoy, you’re not impressing anyone here...    I promised...
caption:
be careful with your fingers

Actually, just put that thing away Greyjoy, you’re not impressing anyone here…    I promised @felicimo to draw Theon some time ago, so here he is, cocky as ever and accompanied by some judgy Starklings. His clothes were designed after Viking fashion, but I took some liberties to make them more fancy.

summary: Do you have any headcanons for king bran? I just imagine him trolling his small council all the time and like judging them. Also...
question: Do you have any headcanons for king bran? I just imagine him trolling his small council all the time and like judging them. Also imagine him and sansa shading people through letters and keeping in touch and sharing fun stories (they always loved stories).
answer:
• bran solves many of the problems his kingdoms face by flying in ravens and directly talking to the people involved (yes he wargs into humans but it apparently isn’t bad in the got universe). sometimes he leaves some problems a little unresolved for his small council to deal with
  • bran really enjoys embarrassing bronn. every time bronn tells a story bran interjects adding details that bronn leaves out all while pretending not to understand why bronn’s annoyed. the others catch on to this and ‘egg’ bran on by asking him what really happened
  • bran’s favourite thing in the world is telling people ‘i’ve been expecting you’ and subtly implying he saw visions about the person visiting him just so that he can look surprised sometimes when he has visitors driving people crazy because they can’t tell what that means for them

  • bran really enjoys embarrassing bronn. every time bronn tells a story bran interjects adding details that bronn leaves out all while pretending not to understand why bronn’s annoyed. the others catch on to this and ‘egg’ bran on by asking him what really happened
  • bran’s favourite thing in the world is telling people ‘i’ve been expecting you’ and subtly implying he saw visions about the person visiting him just so that he can look surprised sometimes when he has visitors driving people crazy because they can’t tell what that means for them

  • bran really enjoys embarrassing bronn. every time bronn tells a story bran interjects adding details that bronn leaves out all while pretending not to understand why bronn’s annoyed. the others catch on to this and ‘egg’ bran on by asking him what really happened
  • bran’s favourite thing in the world is telling people ‘i’ve been expecting you’ and subtly implying he saw visions about the person visiting him just so that he can look surprised sometimes when he has visitors driving people crazy because they can’t tell what that means for them

  • bran really enjoys embarrassing bronn. every time bronn tells a story bran interjects adding details that bronn leaves out all while pretending not to understand why bronn’s annoyed. the others catch on to this and ‘egg’ bran on by asking him what really happened
  • bran’s favourite thing in the world is telling people ‘i’ve been expecting you’ and subtly implying he saw visions about the person visiting him just so that he can look surprised sometimes when he has visitors driving people crazy because they can’t tell what that means for them

summary: I guess Bran might be a ‘dead man’ because of the whole ruler of multiple kingdoms sorta thing? Like everyone  want...
question: I guess Bran might be a ‘dead man’ because of the whole ruler of multiple kingdoms sorta thing? Like everyone  want independence? But even then I doubt a wholeass uprising would happen, maybe by the smallfolk (classism?)
answer: tbh that doesn’t make sense to me. if a certain group of people wanted out, they could have said it during the great council. if they thought that bran giving sansa the north was nepotism, then they can go back to their homes and declare independence. either way bran’s not going to war with them unless they attack the other kingdoms, well bran is a omnipresent individual so he’ll see that as it’s being planned. just because he is disabled doesn’t mean he is easy to kill

summary: So I get were people are coming from when they say stuff like Bran actually could have children and push that. But allot of the...
question: So I get were people are coming from when they say stuff like Bran actually could have children and push that. But allot of the time it comes off very gross and demeaning to me as someone who is infertile due to my disability. It was confirmed in both book and show that he can’t. Erasing that part of his disability makes me feel like they are saying we should value him less because he can’t have kids. Bran doesn’t need to have kids to deserve to be king or be a good person.
answer: True. I guess D&D are so ableist we assumed they added that line out of ignorance. But you’re right.

reblog.comment: True. I guess D&D are so ableist we assumed they added that line out of ignorance. But you’re right.

trail.content_raw: True. I guess D&D are so ableist we assumed they added that line out of ignorance. But you’re right.
trail.content: True. I guess D&D are so ableist we assumed they added that line out of ignorance. But you’re right.

summary: So... The first chapter of the first book was Bran’s chapter. And here are the first sentences of the whole story.
title: So... The first chapter of the first book was Bran’s chapter. And here are the first sentences of the whole story.
body:
The morning had dawned clear and cold, with a crispness that hinted at the end of summer. They set forth at daybreak to see a man beheaded, twenty in all, and Bran rode among them, nervous with excitement. This was the first time he had been deemed old enough to go with his lord father and his brothers to see the king’s justice done. It was the ninth year of summer, and the seventh of Bran’s life.

Just saying.

title: Help finding a fic
body:
I was just searching AO3 for Thrones fic, and I forget exactly what search parameters I used, but one of the top results I got looked from the description like it was one where Bran reset things? Sometimes in season 8? One of the tags was “the ink is dry” or maybe that was the title?

Can anyone help me find this please? I didn’t favorite it and I want to read it.

blog.description: Well if I get snapped by the Tumblr FInger snap  I can be found at:  http://twitter.com/Floridaboiler                Boiler Up from a Purdue grad living in the land of SEC/ACC Football! I root for the Boilermakers, Dolphins, Saints, and Jaguars in Football.  I enjoy, Beer, Bacon, Beaches, Bikinis and humor. Some of this is NSFW, so beware

body:
experiences [B.S]

request: would you ever consider writing a bran x reader based on that anon you got about virgin bran maybe him getting used to being a newly wed and how he hasn’t shared a bed with his wife yet so he feels frustrated because he’s never done anything like that before?

A/N: well virgin!bran is my new favorite thing, also I got carried away with the angst part??? lmao, anyway, enjoy I guess

warnings: angst and a little bit of smut at the end.

Putting on a simple gown you went looking for Bran, you were used to him not being next to you every morning. It was understandable at first, he had to take care of his duties, rebuild King’s Landing for example, but now everything was going fine and you felt like he was evading you.

Looking for him you encountered Brienne who told you Bran was in the garden nex to the meeting room, but he had asked to be left alone.

You went anyway and he was standing in the middle of it, he wasn’t even warging; but he was with his head tilted back and eyes closed.

Taking a few steps, you put your hands carefully on his shoulders and then dragged them to his chest, his eyes opened and looked to you, faces barely a few centimeters away and lips grazing.

“You left early again” you said still not moving, since your hands were on his chest you could feel him hold his breath for a moment.

“Tyrion needed me for something” he said smiling as he took your hands and took them off of his chest, trying to get as far as he could from your touch.

You stared at him, knowing you were about to cry, because you felt like he was avoiding you, he’s been doing it for so long now and at first you understood, he had things to take care of but right now he won’t even kiss you.

Bran looked alarmed at you as he saw how the tears started to accumulate in your eyes. You hated to cry in front of anyone, you never were one to show vulnerability but the while situation was overwhelming you. You loved him and it was horrible to feel like he despised you.

“Y/N… why are you crying? No, come here” he said trying to reach your hand but you took a step away.

“I’ve been trying to understand you” you said, and the tears finally started falling, “to give you the space you needed; I’ve never tried to rush things because I know how things are for you. But now you won’t even kiss me”

“Y/N, I-…”

“No, it’s fine if you don’t want me but at least don’t act like I disgust you” it was all you said before you left. Bran looking at you leave hating himself so damn much. It wasn’t your fault, it could never be your fault. It was all him and now he had made you feel like utter shit.

You spent the day walking around King’s Landing until the sun started to go down, you didn’t want to see Bran. It was the last thing you wanted so you tried to sneak into the castle to your room.

When you got there, you closed the door carefully so no one could notice you were back, turning around you almost let out a scream. Bran was sitting on your shared bed staring back at you.

You opened the door to leave.

“Y/N, no please, stay. I want to talk to you” he said softly.

“What do you want?” you leaned against the door.

“Please, come here” he tapped the place beside him and you battled yourself. Finally walking towards the bed and sitting next to him.

“Listen, none of this is your fault. You could never disgust me. Never. You’re the most beautiful woman I’ve ever seen and I love you, it’s just…” you looked at him intently as he seemed to be conflicted about all this. “I’ve never been with someone. Intimately. And I’m this” he looked down at his legs, “and you’re this beautiful girl with more experience than me; I- I don’t know what to do when you’re around me and surely I don’t want to be a disappointment to you. I’m so sorry”

You took a moment to process things and then jumped to him. Hugging him tightly.

“You could never be a disappointment to me Bran” you said to him. Your lips almost touching, “would you let me teach you?”

His cheeks turned crimson and you tought he was the most beautiful boy ever. So handsome and innocent. And he was all yours just as you were his.

He nodded and you kissed him slowly.

You straddled him and he moaned at the feeling of your clothed parts touching. Taking his hands you placed them on your breasts and looked down at him, admiration and lust filled his gaze.

Leaning down, you kissed him slowly as you grinded on him, Bran groaning at the feeling. You bit his lips as your hands started to take of his clothes, leaving his chest exposed.

You left a trail of kisses all the way from his neck to his chest. Bran looking at you intently, his cheeks rosy and bitting his lower lip. He was something else.

“I’ll make you feel so good.”

You stared at him, knowing you were about to cry, because you felt like he was avoiding you, he’s been doing it for so long now and at first you understood, he had things to take care of but right now he won’t even kiss you.

Bran looked alarmed at you as he saw how the tears started to accumulate in your eyes. You hated to cry in front of anyone, you never were one to show vulnerability but the while situation was overwhelming you. You loved him and it was horrible to feel like he despised you.

“Y/N… why are you crying? No, come here” he said trying to reach your hand but you took a step away.

“I’ve been trying to understand you” you said, and the tears finally started falling, “to give you the space you needed; I’ve never tried to rush things because I know how things are for you. But now you won’t even kiss me”

“Y/N, I-…”

“No, it’s fine if you don’t want me but at least don’t act like I disgust you” it was all you said before you left. Bran looking at you leave hating himself so damn much. It wasn’t your fault, it could never be your fault. It was all him and now he had made you feel like utter shit.

You spent the day walking around King’s Landing until the sun started to go down, you didn’t want to see Bran. It was the last thing you wanted so you tried to sneak into the castle to your room.

When you got there, you closed the door carefully so no one could notice you were back, turning around you almost let out a scream. Bran was sitting on your shared bed staring back at you.

You opened the door to leave.

“Y/N, no please, stay. I want to talk to you” he said softly.

“What do you want?” you leaned against the door.

“Please, come here” he tapped the place beside him and you battled yourself. Finally walking towards the bed and sitting next to him.

“Listen, none of this is your fault. You could never disgust me. Never. You’re the most beautiful woman I’ve ever seen and I love you, it’s just…” you looked at him intently as he seemed to be conflicted about all this. “I’ve never been with someone. Intimately. And I’m this” he looked down at his legs, “and you’re this beautiful girl with more experience than me; I- I don’t know what to do when you’re around me and surely I don’t want to be a disappointment to you. I’m so sorry”

You took a moment to process things and then jumped to him. Hugging him tightly.

“You could never be a disappointment to me Bran” you said to him. Your lips almost touching, “would you let me teach you?”

His cheeks turned crimson and you tought he was the most beautiful boy ever. So handsome and innocent. And he was all yours just as you were his.

He nodded and you kissed him slowly.

You straddled him and he moaned at the feeling of your clothed parts touching. Taking his hands you placed them on your breasts and looked down at him, admiration and lust filled his gaze.

Leaning down, you kissed him slowly as you grinded on him, Bran groaning at the feeling. You bit his lips as your hands started to take of his clothes, leaving his chest exposed.

You left a trail of kisses all the way from his neck to his chest. Bran looking at you intently, his cheeks rosy and bitting his lower lip. He was something else.

“I’ll make you feel so good.”
trail.content:
experiences [B.S]

request: would you ever consider writing a bran x reader based on that anon you got about virgin bran maybe him getting used to being a newly wed and how he hasn’t shared a bed with his wife yet so he feels frustrated because he’s never done anything like that before?

A/N: well virgin!bran is my new favorite thing, also I got carried away with the angst part??? lmao, anyway, enjoy I guess

warnings: angst and a little bit of smut at the end.

Putting on a simple gown you went looking for Bran, you were used to him not being next to you every morning. It was understandable at first, he had to take care of his duties, rebuild King’s Landing for example, but now everything was going fine and you felt like he was evading you.

Looking for him you encountered Brienne who told you Bran was in the garden nex to the meeting room, but he had asked to be left alone.

You went anyway and he was standing in the middle of it, he wasn’t even warging; but he was with his head tilted back and eyes closed.

Taking a few steps, you put your hands carefully on his shoulders and then dragged them to his chest, his eyes opened and looked to you, faces barely a few centimeters away and lips grazing.

“You left early again” you said still not moving, since your hands were on his chest you could feel him hold his breath for a moment.

“Tyrion needed me for something” he said smiling as he took your hands and took them off of his chest, trying to get as far as he could from your touch.

You stared at him, knowing you were about to cry, because you felt like he was avoiding you, he’s been doing it for so long now and at first you understood, he had things to take care of but right now he won’t even kiss you.

“I’ll make you feel so good.”

title: Going North
body:
Chapter two is here, just as promised! Thank you so much for the great response to the first chapter, I’ve never had this many hits in so little time before on any of my stories! And if you really liked it, please leave a comment.

Chapter summary:

Bran tells Jon about his dreams and leaves Winterfell.

–

Also, for those interested, this story is also being posted on Wattpad on an account I share with someone else. Read it here!

☆ masterlist → rules → fandom list → about → fav imagines ☆
Hi! The name’s Ace. My blog runs on requests so send them in, but read my rules and fandom list before doing so! Gifs aren't mine. OC information is in my “about” link. Last but not least, this is a safe space for everyone! Be nice to each other and let your imagination soar.

summary:
Requested by anonymous 
“You know if you’re really trying to hide your affection, it’d probably be easier to do that if you...
body:
Requested by anonymous

“You know if you’re really trying to hide your affection, it’d probably be easier to do that if you stopped staring at him” Said Bran, as the two of you sat by the fire. You looked away from Jojen Reed, who’ve you been dreamily watching for the past few minutes or so, in order to look at your little brother. “Honestly, one of these days if you keep looking at him like that Jojen is sure to find out that you’re head over heels for him” Bran smirked.

Hearing this made you scoff on the outside but on the inside you felt a sense of panic. Have you really been so transparent this entire time. In your head you had masterfully been concealing that you’ve had heart eyes for Jojen ever since you first encountered him in the woods. However, now Bran was suggesting otherwise and the thought of that made you want to vanish from sight instantly. Nevertheless you tried to act as if Bran was nothing more than incorrect when it came to how you saw Jojen. “I have no idea what you’re talking about” you insisted, crossing your arms over your chest as you stuck you nose in the air stubbornly.

Instead of convincing Bran that he was being foolish, you made him snort. Your blood boiled and your cheeks blushed with embarrassment as you watched your brother laugh. The boy’s giggles caused both Jojen and Meera to look over at you two questioningly. Frantically you begged Bran to cease the little fit he was having before the siblings began to suspect anything. “I’m sorry, it’s just that you’re not as good at this as you think” Said Bran as he calmed down. “Nothing you say will make me change my mind. You’re in love”.

REQUESTS ARE OPEN

summary: Hey, wait a minute. Dany made Gendry the legitimate son of King Robert, so like... if Jon refused the throne, Gendry should have...
body: Hey, wait a minute. Dany made Gendry the legitimate son of King Robert, so like… if Jon refused the throne, Gendry should have been next in line, right? Like, I’m not that mad that they elected Bran to be king, but that’s not how monarchy works

reblog.comment: Hey, wait a minute. Dany made Gendry the legitimate son of King Robert, so like… if Jon refused the throne, Gendry should have been next in line, right? Like, I’m not that mad that they elected Bran to be king, but that’s not how monarchy works

trail.content_raw: Hey, wait a minute. Dany made Gendry the legitimate son of King Robert, so like… if Jon refused the throne, Gendry should have been next in line, right? Like, I’m not that mad that they elected Bran to be king, but that’s not how monarchy works
trail.content: Hey, wait a minute. Dany made Gendry the legitimate son of King Robert, so like… if Jon refused the throne, Gendry should have been next in line, right? Like, I’m not that mad that they elected Bran to be king, but that’s not how monarchy works
